description: GetSimCity 4and theRush Hourexpansion pack in one convenient package. Create, grow, and breathe life into your ideal urban environment. Fight disasters both realistic and fantastic. Govern your own virtual metropolis as you see fit withSimCity 4 Deluxe.System Requirements Minimum Specifications:OS:Windows XP onlyProcessor:P3 500 (or equivalent)RAM:256MBHard Drive:1.2 GBVideo Card:32MB supported Direct3D capable video card with DirectX 7.0 or greater  compatible driverAdditional Info:None
